newsitem.title: USA: Footstar says SEC OKs spinoff statement.
newsitem.headline: Footstar says SEC OKs spinoff statement.

text.p: Footstar Inc said Friday that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has approved its Form 10 information statement, clearing the way for it to be spun off to shareholders of Melville Corp.
Melville is to distribute 100 percent of the shares of Footstar common stock to Melville stockholders of record on October 2. It is to be paid out on October 12.
It is to be distributed at a ratio of 0.2879 share of Footstar common stock for every one share of Melville stock held.
After the distribution, there would be about 30.5 million Footstar common shares outstanding, the company said.
Footstar's common stock has been approved for listing on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol FTS.N subject to official notice of issuance.
